text:
I saw you, Nichika.
You were doing great.

Was there really something to praise?
I can think of endless things to fix.

...No,
There were plenty of good points──

──You're obviously not seeing it.
Continuing like this──

It's not necessary to watch, is it?
It's a waste of time.

(That's why it hurts even more,
but...)

The effort you're putting in, the time you spent
at the training camp,it's definitely not wasted.

There's definitely meaning
in Nichika's sincere feelings.

Why can you say that with such certainty?
I don't understand.

...I'm practicing on my own.
You don't need to watch.
